title: Looking for 50 to 100 card T206 lot
author: jasonc

posts.post_title: Looking for 50 to 100 card T206 lot
posts.post_content: Lot no longer needed at this time.
It's not 100, 50, or even 30, but... how about 21 cards? [url]http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/traeregan/for-sale[/url] (down towards the bottom row)
